description: The ban comes weeks after Azerbaijan fought Russian ally Armenia in a conflict over territory.
title: Russia bans Azerbaijani tomatoes over 'pesticide concerns'
title_page: Russia bans Azerbaijani tomatoes over 'pesticide concerns' - BBC News
maintext: After six weeks, the fighting stopped at the end of November when both sides agreed to sign a Russian-brokered peace deal. Azerbaijan gained control of several areas, which it will hold onto, and Armenia promised to withdraw troops from them.
